Definition.Document:
Create Report Views

Objective

Summarize bearing vibration health for ongoing monitoring

Starting Point

Engineers Analysis - all bearings

Time Range - Feb 11, 2004 - Feb 21, 2004

Analysis Steps

1. Use Scorecard Metric to summarize the frequency of abnormal vibration events (workstep)

2. Create a Histogram to view the percent of time in an abnormal state (workstep)
Definition.DocumentBackup\u02c9krista.novstrup@seeq:
Collaboration with Data Scientist

Objective

Use Machine Learning for earlier detection of bearing failure.

Starting Point

Engineers Analysis - all bearings

Time Range - Feb 11, 2004 - Feb 21, 2004

Analysis Steps

Engineer

1. Engineer shares analysis with data scientist

Data Scientist

2. Import spy (Seeq PYthon) library into python environment of choice (e.g., Amazon SageMaker or Azure Machine Learning)

3. Use spy.search() to find cleansed vibration bearing data and normal operation condition

4. Use spy.pull() to load the data into python

5. Develop and test machine learning model

6. Use spy.push() to send the results back to Seeq for the Engineer to view

  • Bearing Status
  • Bearing Abnormal Vibration

Engineer

7. Engineer reviews model output in Seeq (workstep)

8. Create dashboard to monitor bearing health
